input: List all albums by Metallica
expected_sql: SELECT Title FROM Album INNER JOIN Artist ON Album.ArtistId = Artist.ArtistId WHERE Name = 'Metallica';

input: Show all tracks from the album 'Black Album'
expected_sql: SELECT Name FROM Track INNER JOIN Album ON Track.AlbumId = Album.AlbumId WHERE Album.Title = 'Black Album';

input: Get the names of all artists
expected_sql: SELECT Name FROM Artist;

input: Which genres are available?
expected_sql: SELECT Name FROM Genre;

input: Find all employees with their job titles
expected_sql: SELECT FirstName, LastName, Title FROM Employee;

input: List all invoices from the USA
expected_sql: SELECT * FROM Invoice WHERE BillingCountry = 'USA';

input: Show all tracks longer than 5 minutes
expected_sql: SELECT Name FROM Track WHERE Milliseconds > 300000;

input: List all playlists and their number of tracks
expected_sql: SELECT Playlist.Name, COUNT(PlaylistTrack.TrackId) as TrackCount FROM Playlist INNER JOIN PlaylistTrack ON Playlist.PlaylistId = PlaylistTrack.PlaylistId GROUP BY Playlist.Name;

input: Get the total sales for each country
expected_sql: SELECT BillingCountry, SUM(Total) as TotalSales FROM Invoice GROUP BY BillingCountry;

input: Show all customers from Brazil
expected_sql: SELECT FirstName, LastName FROM Customer WHERE Country = 'Brazil';

input: Find the total duration of all tracks in hours
expected_sql: SELECT SUM(Milliseconds) / 3600000.0 as TotalHours FROM Track;

input: What are the most popular genres by track count?
expected_sql: SELECT Genre.Name, COUNT(*) as Count FROM Track INNER JOIN Genre ON Track.GenreId = Genre.GenreId GROUP BY Genre.Name ORDER BY Count DESC;

input: List invoices with total more than 20
expected_sql: SELECT * FROM Invoice WHERE Total > 20;

input: Show all albums and their corresponding artists
expected_sql: SELECT Album.Title, Artist.Name FROM Album INNER JOIN Artist ON Album.ArtistId = Artist.ArtistId;

input: List all employees who report to someone
expected_sql: SELECT FirstName, LastName FROM Employee WHERE ReportsTo IS NOT NULL;

input: Get the average track length in milliseconds
expected_sql: SELECT AVG(Milliseconds) as AvgLength FROM Track;

input: Show all customers with their support representative
expected_sql: SELECT Customer.FirstName, Customer.LastName, Employee.FirstName as RepFirstName, Employee.LastName as RepLastName FROM Customer INNER JOIN Employee ON Customer.SupportRepId = Employee.EmployeeId;

input: Find all invoices with customer name
expected_sql: SELECT Invoice.InvoiceId, Customer.FirstName, Customer.LastName, Invoice.Total FROM Invoice INNER JOIN Customer ON Invoice.CustomerId = Customer.CustomerId;

input: Which tracks are in the 'Rock' genre?
expected_sql: SELECT Track.Name FROM Track INNER JOIN Genre ON Track.GenreId = Genre.GenreId WHERE Genre.Name = 'Rock';

input: List customers from each country
expected_sql: SELECT Country, COUNT(*) as CustomerCount FROM Customer GROUP BY Country;

input: Get all albums released by 'AC/DC'
expected_sql: SELECT Title FROM Album INNER JOIN Artist ON Album.ArtistId = Artist.ArtistId WHERE Name = 'AC/DC';

input: List top 5 most expensive tracks
expected_sql: SELECT Name, UnitPrice FROM Track ORDER BY UnitPrice DESC LIMIT 5;

input: Find all customers in Canada
expected_sql: SELECT FirstName, LastName FROM Customer WHERE Country = 'Canada';

input: Show invoice details including customer name and total
expected_sql: SELECT Invoice.InvoiceId, Customer.FirstName, Customer.LastName, Invoice.Total FROM Invoice INNER JOIN Customer ON Invoice.CustomerId = Customer.CustomerId;

input: Get the total sales made by each employee
expected_sql: SELECT Employee.FirstName, Employee.LastName, SUM(Invoice.Total) as Sales FROM Customer INNER JOIN Employee ON Customer.SupportRepId = Employee.EmployeeId INNER JOIN Invoice ON Customer.CustomerId = Invoice.CustomerId GROUP BY Employee.EmployeeId;

input: List all tracks that are in the playlist 'Music'
expected_sql: SELECT Track.Name FROM Track INNER JOIN PlaylistTrack ON Track.TrackId = PlaylistTrack.TrackId INNER JOIN Playlist ON Playlist.PlaylistId = PlaylistTrack.PlaylistId WHERE Playlist.Name = 'Music';

input: Get customers who have not made any purchases
expected_sql: SELECT FirstName, LastName FROM Customer WHERE CustomerId NOT IN (SELECT CustomerId FROM Invoice);

input: Find the artist who has the most albums
expected_sql: SELECT Artist.Name FROM Album INNER JOIN Artist ON Album.ArtistId = Artist.ArtistId GROUP BY Artist.ArtistId ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1;

input: List all genres with their total number of tracks
expected_sql: SELECT Genre.Name, COUNT(Track.TrackId) FROM Genre INNER JOIN Track ON Genre.GenreId = Track.GenreId GROUP BY Genre.Name;

input: Which albums have more than 10 tracks?
expected_sql: SELECT Album.Title FROM Album INNER JOIN Track ON Album.AlbumId = Track.AlbumId GROUP BY Album.Title HAVING COUNT(Track.TrackId) > 10;
